channel.title: Please Help, How Does This Code Even Work?
channel.description:
I am not new to java, so this may sound like a contradicting statement but my question will remain the same no matter.
I am curious on how a client works... Now before you begin to think of a smart ass rant, i am curious on how the server and the client corespond, as in how does the server go into the files of the client, and dictate what to use, i am thinking that when the server goes online, and you connect the directory becomes the HOST of the files and the server is just there to pick and choose, i am trying to set up my own game like Moparscape, but with me as the only server, and i am curious if i could do that with moparscape, like you guys do with your homemade clients, like how it is possible to add objects as long as everyone has the same client, i am curious if i could possibly add enough objects and terrain, enough to fill the client and make it look as if it was not even close to runescape.
I looked for a place to post this BTW and there is no fucking place so before you rant with your 12yo BS, please note i did put some attention to where i should post.
-Thanks.
Project Zlap. 00000000.1% Done! I only need to clean up the code and im done lol jk.

item.title: Please Help, How Does This Code Even Work?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Zlap Project Zlap
item.description:
@Project_Zlap wrote:

Thank you so much, i wish i could rep you… Once again thank you!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help, How Does This Code Even Work?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

If you want to edit the maps you can use this map editor:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,351106.0.html

Plus you can create your own npcs, armour/weapons and objects using a modeling program:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html

And Finally, if you want to edit textures and interfaces use AuraDevil Cache Modifier/Repacker
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,357423.0.html

Hope you make good use of these utilities and make a nice game

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help, How Does This Code Even Work?

@Project_Zlap wrote:

I am not new to java, so this may sound like a contradicting statement but my question will remain the same no matter.

I am curious on how a client works…
Now before you begin to think of a smart ass rant, i am curious on how the server and the client corespond, as in how does the server go into the files of the client, and dictate what to use, i am thinking that when the server goes online, and you connect the directory becomes the HOST of the files and the server is just there to pick and choose, i am trying to set up my own game like Moparscape, but with me as the only server, and i am curious if i could do that with moparscape, like you guys do with your homemade clients, like how it is possible to add objects as long as everyone has the same client, i am curious if i could possibly add enough objects and terrain, enough to fill the client and make it look as if it was not even close to runescape.
